name: Vaporwave
author: M A C I N T O S H P L U S
description: A E S T H E T I C   C O D E   S T U D I E S. It's all in your head. リサフランク420 / 現代のコンピュー

messages: A E S T H E T I C
It's all in your head.
リサフランク420 / 現代のコンピュー
This code is a critique of late capitalism.
Your variables feel so empty inside.
Nostalgia for a past that never existed.
The mall is closed. The code remains.
S L O W   D O W N
This function brought to you by Windows 95.
Endless loops. Endless consumption.
The future is now. The future is broken.
Your code is valid but meaningless.
Bathed in pink and cyan. Forever.
This is not a bug. This is a feature of existence.
古いテクノロジーの美学
Shopping for variables at the digital plaza.
Private void of meaning.
Greco-Roman statues approve of this code.
The dolphin jumps at sunset. The code compiles.
E M P T Y   S P A C E S
This code is best viewed at 3 AM.
Floral Shoppe says: return to form;
The grid stretches to infinity.
I T ' S   A L L   S O   T I R E S O M E
